item.title: MacVim snapshot-160
item.description:
Vim patch 8.1.2224

General:

  • MacVim now requires macOS 10.9, up from 10.8.
  • MacVim binary is now notaraized by Apple. This should make it open properly without a security warning in macOS 10.15 Catalina. #959 #825

Features:

  • Make mouse cursor higher contrast under macOS 10.13 or older. #910

Fixes:

  • Fix OS appearance (dark vs light mode) detection not working. See :help OSAppearanceChanged for more info on the feature. #973
  • Fix spell checker flagging first words in line. #971 (Vim 8.1.2172)
  • Fix wrong highlighting color scheme. #960 (Vim 8.1.2176)

Misc:

  • Sparkle updater has been updated to 1.22.00. #963

Targets macOS 10.9+

Script interfaces have compatibility with these versions:

  • Lua 5.3
  • Perl 5.18
  • Python2 2.7
  • Python3 3.7
  • Ruby 2.6
